articles.description: Seema revealed that although the divorce was filed last year, she and Sohail had been separated for quite a few years.
articles.content: Seema Sajdeh filed for divorce from Sohail Khan last year. Seema and Sohail were married for 24 years but had to end their marriage due to certain reasons. Seema recently appeared on Karan Johars sho… [+2008 chars]
